content: Open the report below to see what data is included. Error reports do not contain any personal data of the users. To help our team better understand the problem, describe it in the free form using the comment field.

comment.text: This translation key is used for an error report description, guiding users to view a report that contains no personal data and providing an opportunity to describe the issue in free form. It appears on a modal dialog header, prompting users to explore the report further.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "to see what data is included" is translated as "Hansı məlumatın daxil olduğunu görmək". A more natural and accurate translation would be something like "hansı məlumatın olduğunu görmək üçün" (to see what information is).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Hansı məlumatın olduğunu görmək üçün aşağıdakı hesabatı açın.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "describe it in the free form using the comment field" is translated as "şərh sahəsindən istifadə edərək məsələni aydın şəkildə təsvir edin". While technically correct, it's a bit verbose. A more concise and natural rendering would be "şərh hissəsində məsələni təsvir edin."
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: şərh hissəsində məsələni təsvir edin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Avaan alla oleva raportti' is grammatically awkward. It literally translates to 'I open the report below'. A more natural phrasing would be 'Avaa alla oleva raportti' (Open the report below).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Avaa alla oleva raportti

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "To help our team better understand the problem" is translated as "私たちのチームが問題をよりよく理解するために". While technically correct, it sounds overly formal and verbose for this context. A more natural and concise translation might be "問題を把握するために".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 問題を把握するために

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "describe it in the free form using the comment field" is translated as "コメント欄を使ってフリーフォームで問題を記述して頂ければ幸いです".  "フリーフォーム" is a direct transliteration and feels awkward.  The use of “頂ければ幸いです” (if you would be kind to) is also overly formal. A more natural translation would be "コメント欄に自由に記述してください".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: コメント欄に自由に記述してください

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence structure is a little long and can be broken up for better readability. The current translation feels slightly clumsy.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 以下のレポートを開き、データをご確認ください。エラーレポートには、ユーザーの個人情報は一切含まれていません。問題を把握するために、コメント欄に自由に記述してください。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "해당 문제에 대해 설명해 주세요" (hae-dang mun-je-e dae-hae seol-myeong-hae ju-se-yo) is a bit formal for this context. A more natural phrasing would be closer to "문제에 대해 설명해 주세요" (mun-je-e dae-hae seol-myeong-hae ju-se-yo) or even just "설명해 주세요" (seol-myeong-hae ju-se-yo).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 설명해 주세요

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, the repetition of "해당" (hae-dang) makes the sentence slightly awkward. Removing one instance would improve flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 오류 보고서에는 사용자의 개인 데이터가 포함되지 않습니다. 저희가 해당 문제를 더 잘 이해할 수 있도록 설명란에 자유롭게 문제에 대해 설명해 주세요.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ເປີດ' (open) in 'ເປີດບົດລາຍງານ' could be more naturally phrased. While technically correct, it sounds slightly formal in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'ເບິ່ງບົດລາຍງານ' (view the report) instead.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ອະທິບາຍໄດ້ຕາມໃຈ' is a bit awkward. While it conveys 'describe freely', a more fluent phrasing is possible.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'ອະທິບາຍໄດ້ຕາມໃຈ' with 'ອະທິບາຍຢ່າງເສລີ' (describe freely).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The sentence "Deschideţi raportul de mai jos pentru a verifica datele incluse" could be improved. While grammatically correct, 'verifica' (verify) isn't the best choice. 'A vedea' (to see) or 'a consulta' (to consult) would flow better in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Deschideţi raportul de mai jos pentru a vedea datele incluse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The imperative verb 'Deschideți' uses the polite/formal 'voi' form. Depending on the target audience and platform, a less formal 'Deschide' might be more appropriate.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Deschide raportul de mai jos pentru a vedea datele incluse.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Open the report below" is translated as "අඩංගු දත්ත බැලීමට පහත වාර්තාව විවෘත කරන්න". While technically correct, it's a bit wordy. A more natural translation might be "පහත වාර්තාව తెరిచి බැලීමෙන් ඇතුළත් දත්ත බැලිය හැකිය" or simply "පහත වාර්තාව తెరిచి බැලන්න".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: පහත වාර්තාව తెరిచి බැලන්න

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Error reports do not contain any personal data of the users" is translated as "අපගේ දෝෂ වාර්තා වලට පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ගේ පෞද්ගලික දත්ත කිසිවක් ඇතුළත් නොකරයි". This is somewhat literal. A more fluent translation would be something like, "අපගේ දෝෂ වාර්තා පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ගේ පුද්ගලික දත්ත නොතිබිණි" or "දෝෂ වාර්තා වල පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ගේ පුද්ගලික දත්ත ఉండదు".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: දෝෂ වාර්තා වල පරිශ්‍රීලකයින්ගේ පුද්ගලික දත්ත ఉండదు

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "comment field" is translated as "අදහස් ක්‍ෂේත්‍රය".  While understandable, it's a technical term. A simpler and more natural phrasing would be "අදහස් දිනපොත්" (comments section) or simply "අදහස් පළ කිරීමේ ස්ථානය" (place to provide comments).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: අදහස් පළ කිරීමේ ස්ථානය

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'ඔන්ලිඔෆිස්' appears out of nowhere.  It doesn't seem to be a proper translation of anything and disrupts the flow. It should be removed or replaced with a more accurate equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove 'ඔන්ලිඔෆිස්' or replace it with the correct company/team name if applicable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'poličke Komentár' is awkward and doesn't clearly represent 'comment field'. It appears to be a literal translation but lacks natural flow in Slovak.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider rephrasing to something like 'v poli Komentár' or 'v komentárnom poli' to better convey the meaning of 'comment field'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'hlásenie' can mean 'report', in the context of error reporting, 'chybová správa' or 'správa o chybe' might be more accurate and idiomatic.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace 'hlásenie' with 'chybová správa' or 'správa o chybe'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Otvorite izveštaj ispod" is slightly awkward. A more natural phrasing would be "Otvorite izveštaj koji sledi" or "Otvorite izveštaj dole".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otvorite izveštaj koji sledi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'sadrže' could be improved. While technically correct, 'ne sadrže' can sound a bit stiff. A better translation might be 'ne sadrže nikakve'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ne sadrže nikakve

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "free form" is not accurately translated. "Düz yazı olarak" is a literal translation but doesn't convey the intended meaning of 'free form' in the context of a comment field.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider a more natural phrasing like "serbest metin olarak" or "kendi cümlelerinizle" to better convey the meaning of 'free form'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the sentence structure feels slightly awkward in Turkish.  The transition between sentences could be smoother.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Rephrase the sentences for better flow: "Hangi verilerin dahil edildiğini görmek için aşağıdaki raporu açın. Hata raporları kullanıcıların kişisel verilerini içermez. Sorunu daha iyi anlamamıza yardımcı olmak için, yorum alanında kendi cümlelerinizle açıklayın."

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "xin hãy mô tả nó" is overly formal for this context. A more natural phrasing would be 'hãy mô tả'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: hãy mô tả nó
